choices.text:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company
Subject: Resignation - Notification of Departure

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to inform you that, after much thought and consideration, I have decided to resign from my position at our esteemed company, effective two weeks from today. My last day with the organization will be on [Resignation Date].

During my time here, I have had the opportunity to work alongside a talented team and learn invaluable skills that will serve me well throughout my career. I am grateful for the experiences and growth this role has provided me with, and I am confident that it has prepared me for future challenges.

I would like to take this opportunity to thank you, [Boss's Name], as well as everyone at our company, for their support and guidance throughout my tenure here. Your leadership and mentorship have been invaluable, and I am truly grateful for the experience of working with such a dedicated team.

Please let me know what steps need to be taken to ensure a smooth transition during this time, including any documentation or tasks that require completion before my departure. Additionally, if there are any specific projects or responsibilities you would like me to focus on in these last few weeks, I am more than happy to do so.

Once again, thank you for the opportunity to be a part of such an amazing team and organization. I wish everyone continued success and growth in the future. If we remain connected professionally or personally, please feel free to reach out at any time.

Sincerely,

[Your Full Name]
